name: Aetherius
description: Aetherius Token it is the first token to let you be part of the mining process as a mining-backed cryptocurrency. Is a derivative digital asset whose value is supported by a crypto mining farm. Also, Aetherius is the only token with financial support from a mining farm. A percentage from the mining profit will be injected every month into Aetherius to support the continues growing of the price.
